comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: This, at age 5, is Alexei Nikolaevich Romanov (Russian: Алексе́й Никола́евич) (12 August 1904 – 17 July 1918), the only son of Nikolai (Nicholas II) and Alexandra, the last Tsar and Tsaritsa of the Russian Empire. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Alexei_Nikolaevich,_Tsarevich_of_Ru... Czarewitch is an older variant transliteration of Царе́вич, now more commonly written in English as Tsarevitch, meaning any male son of the Tsar. And see:

comment.author: 34985608@N03
comment._content: artolog: Thanks for providing the modern transliteration and his full name. We'll add it to the record when we update.
